question: Display amusement parks and water parks in Orlando, Florida.
sql_query1:
SELECT Amusement_Parks.name
FROM Amusement_Parks
WHERE Amusement_Parks.Location = "Orlando, Florida"
UNION
SELECT Water_Parks.name
FROM Water_Parks
WHERE Water_Parks.Location = "Orlando, Florida"
sql_query2:
SELECT Amusement_Parks.name
FROM Amusement_Parks
UNION
SELECT Water_Parks.name
FROM Water_Parks
WHERE Water_Parks.Location = "Orlando, Florida"
interpretation1: Can you show both amusement parks in Orlando, Florida and water parks located there?
interpretation2: List all amusement parks and also display water parks located in Orlando Florida.
